mapper.sql: SELECT bs.id id , bs.lat lat , bs.lon lon , bs.court_type courtType , bs.fee_yn feeYn , bs.court_size courtSize , bs.goal_post goalPost , bs.park_yn parkYn , bs.create_date createDate , bs.modify_date modifyDate , bs.address address , bs.comment comment , bs.court_name courtName , bs.has_light hasLight , bs.light_time lightTime , bs.open_status openStatus , bs.open_time openTime FROM basket_spot bs
mapper.select: LEFT JOIN BASKET_SPOT_DELETE bsd ON bs.ID = bsd.BASKET_SPOT_ID WHERE bsd.DELETE_STATE IS NULL OR bsd.DELETE_STATE != 1
